Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! We finally made it back, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That was a great reception, but man, did it
tucker me out!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, at least we managed to make it home.
There were so many "one last things" that I
thought we'd never leave...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I never expected a wedding could be this
draining.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know about you, but I'm exhausted. How
are you holding up, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I never expected they'd throw a spur-of-the-
moment after-party at my restaurant. Urgh...how
could they still pack away that much food?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. We've finally arrived home, <MYNAME>.
Are you still hanging in there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm exhausted. I'd heard weddings could be
demanding, but I never expected them to be this
tiring!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ugh, I'm beat.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I was so nervous and uptight all day that my
shoulders are in knots. You, on the other hand,
look totally fine, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew. Finally made it back. You hanging in
there, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I was so nervous last night I hardly slept. It feels
like the sleep deprivation is nipping at my heels
now.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oof, I'm exhausted. Even though I'm a natural
when it comes to social gatherings, I wasn't
quite ready for this much activity.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I never expected my own wedding could be this
draining. Though you seem like you've got some
energy to spare, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. Finally, we're back home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Bless all the well-wishers, but I was afraid the
sun would rise before they let us go. I feel utterly
exhausted.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Wow... That was even more nerve-wracking
than a live broadcast. My heart is still running a
mile a minute.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going to friends' weddings never prepared me
for how tiring it is when the camera's on you.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew...home at last. All I want to do is jump
into bed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Who knew weddings could be so exhausting?
I've had more energy left after hog-tying bears.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, goodness. My pulse is entirely too fast, and
I feel a bit faint. I didn't think I'd be this
nervous...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm glad I didn't feel this way at the reception. I
might have collapsed and ruined our special
day...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, the ceremony's over, but our life is just
beginning. After I've rested, anyway. I'm so beat.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Marriage isn't something to be undertaken
lightly, I guess. Oh, er...I'm doing all right.
Honest.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh yeah! I was way too embarrassed to do this
in front of everybody, but now that we're alone I
can give this to you.
<PAGE>
Here you go!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Er...ahem. Now that we're no longer surrounded
by prying eyes, I'd like to give this to you.
<PAGE>
Here.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, right! Everything was moving so fast, I didn't
have the chance to give this to you.
<PAGE>
Here.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, glad I didn't forget. <MYNAME>, this is for
you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh yeah. Almost forgot. <MYNAME>, hold out
your hand.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Let me give this to you while it's just the two of
us. I'm sorry I wasn't able to give it to you
earlier.
<PAGE>
Here, hold out your hand.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Now then. <MYNAME>, hold out your hand.
Come on, hold it out!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, yes. Would you hold out your hand? I have a
present I've been meaning to give you all day.
Here.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, right! <MYNAME>, do you have a minute? I
couldn't get this to you earlier, but here. I hope
you like it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh! I was hoping to give this to you earlier...
<MYNAME>, could you hold out your hand,
please? Here you go!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, I might as well give this to you while it's on
my mind. Hold out your hand.
<PAGE>
Here.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Um...right. Could you...hold out your hand?
<PAGE>
Come on, take it now.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's our wedding ring! I was so worried I'd
forget to give it to you, so now that I have, it's a
real load off.
<PAGE>
So, as of today, we're startin' a new life together!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's our wedding ring. I couldn't find the
appropriate timing to give it to you earlier.
<PAGE>
It's finally starting to sink in that we're married
now, come what may.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's our wedding ring. I was so busy cooking
up a storm that I didn't have a chance to give it
to you. Sorry.
<PAGE>
But now you have it. I can't wait to see what life
has in store for us.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's our wedding ring. I'd hoped to give it to you
earlier, but it never felt like the right moment,
surrounded by all the bustle and guests.
<PAGE>
I thought I'd be more nervous about this, but
right now I feel calm and confident.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I know it's late, but I wanted to give you our
wedding ring. I didn't have a chance to give it to
you earlier.
<PAGE>
Now we're husband and wife, and in it for life.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah. It's our wedding ring. I was so worried
about finding the perfect moment to give it to
you that I froze up.
<PAGE>
But now you have it. And right now IS a pretty
good moment, I think.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I can hardly see why -I- must be the one to give
this to you as opposed to the other way around,
but here. It's our w-w-wedding ring.
<PAGE>
Now we can formally begin our new life
together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's our wedding ring, of course. We could hardly
do without one, you know. I'm glad you like it.
<PAGE>
With the ceremony done and the ring given, I'm
excited to finally begin our new life together.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's our wedding ring. It was, uh...too
embarrassing for me to try giving it to you in
front of everybody, so I decided to wait.
<PAGE>
Whew! Now it really feels like the ceremony is
complete and we're officially husband and wife.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's our wedding ring. I was, um...just a teeny bit
too shy to give it to you while everyone was
around.
<PAGE>
There! That's done. From this point on, we're in
it together.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's our wedding ring. I got so overwhelmed
thinking of the moment when I'd give it to you
that I ended up putting it off until now.
<PAGE>
However, I think that's the last thing I had to do.
Now we can move forward together into our
new life.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's, er...our wedding ring. I waited until now to
give it to you because I wanted to surprise you.
<PAGE>
But now you have it, and we can really start
growing together.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, since we're all married and stuff now, I
dunno if we should keep callin' each other the
same names as before.
<PAGE>
I mean, we're gonna be living together as a
couple, so we should come up with new
nicknames as husband and wife!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seeing as we're now husband and wife, it feels a
touch odd to continue using our affectionate
names from when we were courting.
<PAGE>
We've both turned a new page in our lives. What
do you say we symbolize that by coming up
with new terms of endearment?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y'know... Now that we're married and all, I don't
know if we should still call each other the same
things we did when we were just sweethearts.
<PAGE>
This is a new chapter in our lives, right? How
about new nicknames for a new chapter?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, yes. <MYNAME>, how about we liven things
up by choosing new nicknames to call each
other by?
<PAGE>
It feels strange to keep calling each other what
we did during our courtship. We should have
something fit to last a lifetime.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...? It, uh, feels weird to keep
referring to each other like we did when we were
dating.
<PAGE>
Since we're starting a new life, it's a good time
to rethink our pet names for each other,
wouldn't you say?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, since we're starting a new phase in
our lives and all, I feel like we should liven up
our pet names for each other, too.
<PAGE>
We can't go around like we're starstruck lovers
forever. I think something spousal would be
pretty fab.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. As we're embarking on our glorious
future together tomorrow, it's only proper to
think up even better terms of endearment.
<PAGE>
Now that we're husband and wife, our pet
names should be so sweet that cake frosting
would be jealous!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that we've begun a new chapter in our
lives, what do you say we choose some darling
new epithets for each other?
<PAGE>
Maybe it's just me, but I feel like our terms of
endearment from when we were courting don't
quite do justice to the love we have now.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um...I have a suggestion. Now that we're gonna
be living together, why don't we freshen things
up with new terms of endearment?
<PAGE>
I think it would be pretty neat to symbolize our
new lives with new, spousal-strength
nicknames. Don't you think so too?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, now that we're starting a new season in our
lives, I kinda want to revisit our old names for
each other.
<PAGE>
What do you think, <MYNAME>? Should we
change them?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that we're married, continuing to address
each other as we did when we were courting
seems strangely at odds with our new life.
<PAGE>
Accordingly, I suggest we use this opportune
moment to give ourselves new nicknames. It m-
might be cute...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Er...I was thinking that maybe we should change
what we call each other. I mean, not our NAME
names, but...you get me, right?
<PAGE>
I mean, now that we've tied the knot, shouldn't
our nicknames have a husband-and-wifely feel
to them? How about it?
Let's try something new.
I like them as they are.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what do you want me to call you?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. What would you like me to call you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. So, what should I call you?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How would you like me to address you?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. What do you want me to call you?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what would sound like music to your ears?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Splendid. What shall I call you, then?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. What would you like for me to call
you?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. What should I call you, then?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. What do you want me to call you?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What would you like me to call you?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What should I call you, then?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> it is, then?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> all right?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're all right with <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to continue calling you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You like the name <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So I can call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd prefer the name <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, you'll be <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> to me, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Gotcha! <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> it is, then!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. From now on, I will call you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> it is.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. From today forward, I shall call you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Right. <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> is a-okay.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. I hope <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> sounds sweeter every
time I say it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. Henceforth, you'll always be
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> to me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wonderful! <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> seems perfect for you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! I'll call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh yeah! <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> sounds just like you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. I will call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Got it. <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> it is.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay! Since we're gonna be livin' together now,
how about we hash out our responsibilities?
<PAGE>
First off, I know you're always real busy with
your farm, right? I have mine, too, but why don't
I take on all the household chores?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. As we officially embark on our new life
together, I think setting down some rules will
help smooth the transition.
<PAGE>
Your farm work keeps you quite busy, correct?
Then may I take care of all of the housework?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right. So, since we're starting married life
tomorrow, we should probably divvy up the
responsibilities first.
<PAGE>
Your job runs 24/7 with no set days off, so how
about you let me take care of the household
chores? You've got your hands pretty full.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, what say we allocate some basic
responsibilities before we begin our married life
tomorrow?
<PAGE>
As your daily farm work keeps you rather tied
up, how about I take responsibility for the care
and maintenance of our household?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before we start our new life together tomorrow,
I'd feel good about deciding on some of our
responsibilities first.
<PAGE>
I know you keep yourself pretty busy taking care
of your farm, so I think it'd be easiest if I took on
the household chores.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, how about we set up a few house rules
beforehand for a little head start at harmonious
living?
<PAGE>
You pretty much work dawn to dusk on your
farm, right? Why don't I take care of the day-to-
day housekeeping?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our new life doesn't formally begin until
tomorrow, but I would like to take care of some
arrangements first.
<PAGE>
Your farm demands a great deal of your time
every day, correct? I have my own farm to look
after, of course...
<PAGE>
But I can leave the majority of that in the hands
of my servants. That will allow me to easily
perform all of our household chores.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, tomorrow's going to be the start of
something wonderful for us, so let's get all the
house rules out of the way first, okay?
<PAGE>
I know your farm keeps you busy day-in and
day-out, so why don't you leave the household
chores to me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, um, since we're going to be living together, I
thought we should figure out who's gonna be
responsible for what.
<PAGE>
You have a lot to do on your farm every day, so I
think it works out well if I take care of the
household chores.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we'll be living together now, it's probably a
good idea to actually figure out what we'll be
doing.
<PAGE>
You have your farm and animals to take care of,
so how about I take care of things around the
house?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you know, every marriage requires rules in
order to function properly. We should set some
up.
<PAGE>
As you seem to have your hands full with your
farm, what do you say I handle the day-to-day
household chores?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is really it...our life as husband and wife will
begin tomorrow. Before that, I think we should
figure out who's responsible for what.
<PAGE>
Running your farm keeps your schedule pretty
packed, so how about I handle the chores and
housework?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Really? But I kinda like doing house chores --
they put me in that zen of concentration. Ya
don't have to say that just to be polite or nothin'.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay, then how about we take turns cooking, at
least?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh? Well, how shall we divide things up, then?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, I know. At least allow me to take my turn at
cooking our meals. Tut-tut, don't try to argue
this one. My mind is already made up.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? Hunh. And here I thought it was a pretty
nice setup, myself...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay then. How about we at least take turns
with the cooking? When it comes to the
kitchen, you know I've got the goods.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? All right... Well then, what say we do this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We can take turns cooking our daily meals. Do
you find that arrangement more to your taste?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? So then how do you wanna handle it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay, how about this? We can take turns
cooking. It'll help keep things fresh.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
C'mon now, you shouldn't have to shoulder
everything. What would be a good arrangement
for you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh! How about this? We'll spice up mealtime by
taking turns in the kitchen.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Y-you needn't feel as though you must protect a
lady's hands from manual labor. I've earned my
black belt in bridal training, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Still, if you insist, how about we at least take
turns preparing meals?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It wouldn't be a big change for me, really. I
already work from home as it is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Heehee... Well, if you insist. Tell you what. How
about we take turns making meals?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Aww...I thought that was a pretty good idea,
too. Lessee...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay, so how about we at least take turns
cooking?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? Oh. Ummm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>How about we take turns cooking, then? That
could be fun.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? Hrm... Well, I hadn't really thought past
that, since I figured you'd agree.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, I know. How about we take turns preparing
meals?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No? And here I thought it was such a good idea,
too...
<PAGE>
Well, here's a tasty compromise. What do you
say we take turns cooking meals?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great! Let's do that, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Whenever you wanna eat together, just examine
the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
We can do breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00,
lunch between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner
between 19:00 and 21:00. Okay?
<PAGE>
We can decide which of us will do the cooking
right on the spot.
<PAGE>
If we're too busy around mealtimes, we can
always just eat separately.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Perfect! We'll do that, then. Knowing how busy
your farm keeps you, I could never forgive
myself if I foisted all of the housework on you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, when you wish to dine together,
simply examine the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
Breakfast will be between 6:00 and 8:00, lunch
between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner between
19:00 and 21:00. Understood?
<PAGE>
We will decide at that time whether you or I shall
prepare the meal.
<PAGE>
If you'd rather not eat together for some reason,
we can eat separately instead.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great! Leave the cooking to me, then. I
guarantee you'll be satisfied.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you want to eat together, just come and
search the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
We can do breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00,
lunch between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner
between 19:00 and 21:00. That sound good? 
<PAGE>
We can decide then if you or I will whip up our
latest culinary masterpiece.
<PAGE>
If you'd rather dine alone, though, we can
always eat separately.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, splendid. I'm glad you agree. I had no idea
what I would do if you vetoed this idea too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you would like to dine together, come and
search the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
Let's have our breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00,
lunch between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner
between 19:00 and 21:00.
<PAGE>
We can decide which of us will prepare the meal
then.
<PAGE>
If you would rather dine alone, we can simply
take our meals separately.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good. Looks like it's the real deal starting
tomorrow, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you want to eat together, just examine the
table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
Let's do breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00, lunch
between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner between
19:00 and 21:00.
<PAGE>
We'll decide whether you or I will cook then.
<PAGE>
If we're too busy around mealtimes, we can just
eat separately.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah, that sounds good to me. I'll give it my
best shot.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you want us to eat together, just come
and search the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
We can do breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00,
lunch between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner
between 19:00 and 21:00.
<PAGE>
We'll wait until then to see which of us feels
more up to cooking the meal.
<PAGE>
But if you're busy and would rather we each eat
on our own, we can do that too.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent! A rotating schedule it shall be, then!
Just you watch, now. I think you'll be surprised
by my culinary talents! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you wish to dine together, simply examine
the table during mealtimes.
<PAGE>
Let's take breakfast between 6:00 and 8:00,
lunch between 12:00 and 14:00, and dinner
between 19:00 and 21:00.
<PAGE>
We will decide at that time which of us shall
prepare the meal.
<PAGE>
If you would rather not eat together, which
would of course be your loss, we can also eat
meals separately.
